DOC.brief_summary: To determine response rate pazopanib administer monotherapy patient unresectable neuroendocrine tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Study Pazopanib Monotherapy Patients With Unresectable , Metastatic Neuroendocrine Tumor
DOC.criteria: low intermediate grade neuroendocrine tumor amenable surgery local therapy poorly differentiate ( high grade anaplastic ) /small cell , pheochromocytoma
